title: Mind Body Connection | Chiropractor in East Rochester, New York | Dodge Chiropractic
description: Mind Body Connection in East Rochester, New York. Dodge Chiropractic is your local Chiropractor in East Rochester serving all of your needs. Call us today at (585) 377-4070 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Whether we're driving a car, riding a bike, or trying to record a spare at our local bowling alley, our musculoskeletal system bases its decision-making on past history, that is, what it has learned before.
